H0.text: Return the mineral to its box after acid is dropped on the sample to test whether it bubbles.

H1.text: Rinse the mineral with water, dry it, and return it to the box after testing it with acid to determine if it bubbles.

H2.text: Wipe the mineral with a paper towel and return it to the box after the acid test for bubbling has been performed.

H3.text: Put the mineral in the sink and leave it for the teacher to clean up is what should be done with the mineral after testing it with acid to determine if it bubbles.
